send_critical_notification.title: Critical Notification Alert
send_critical_notification.notification: The feature is enabled for the driver. Confirming will activate a siren on their phone, disabling all app functions for immediate communication

alarm.message: When you activate the siren in the driver's app, you can close this window only by either deactivating the siren or when the driver responds

app_not_installed.message: The driver does not have the app installed. You can send a text message with a link to download the app and enable this feature.

missing_app_and_contact_info.message: The driver has not installed the app, and there is no provided phone number, making it impossible to send a download link.

feature_not_enabled.message: The driver has the app installed but hasn't activated this feature. You can send an activation link for the driver to enable it.
